feed.title: Ben Rhine
feed.subtitle: Ben is a seasoned polyglot developer and development team lead with more than a decade of experience under his belt. He has worked across the board from small startups to multiple Fortune 100 companies. He specializes in Java and Groovy on Grails development with excelent Javascript skills across several major frameworks.

entry.title: Initial Post - So I dont forget how my new theme works

link.title: Initial Post - So I dont forget how my new theme works

entry.content:
Remembering how to create new posts

This is pretty much it for now
entry.summary: Trying not to forget how this new new Jekyll thing works
